typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FLT_ID as integer,
		DLAY_TYP as string,
		DURTN_MNT as integer,
		DLAY_CD as string,
		DLAY_CD_NAME as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgFlightsDelay
source(output(
		ACTL_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_IN as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OFF as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_ON as string,
		ACTL_OOOI_OUT as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_RGSTRN_NUM as string,
		AIR_CRAFT_TYPE as string,
		BASE_AIR_PORT as string,
		CRGO_WGT as string,
		ESTD_ARRVL as string,
		ESTD_DPTR as string,
		FLT_DT as string,
		FLT_ID as integer,
		FLT_NUM as string,
		FLT_TYPE as string,
		FUEL_IN as double,
		FUEL_OUT as double,
		FUEL_UPLIFT as integer,
		IS_CNCLD as boolean,
		IS_VERFD as boolean,
		MAINT_LOG_PG as integer,
		NOTES as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL as string,
		SCHDD_ARRVL_AIR_PORT as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR as string,
		SCHDD_DPTR_AIR_PORT as string,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StgFlights
StgFlightsDelay split(isNull(DLAY_CD) || isNull(DLAY_CD_NAME) || isNull(FLT_ID) || isNull(DLAY_TYP),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Reject, FilteredData)
ConditionalSplit1@Reject, ConditionalSplit1@FilteredData union(byName: true)~> RejectAndDoesntExsist
ConditionalSplit1@FilteredData, StgFlights exists(ConditionalSplit1@FilteredData@FLT_ID == StgFlights@FLT_ID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FlightsIdExists
FlightsIdExists split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: false) ~> DelayType@(DelayTypeDeparture, DelayTypeDeparture)
